title: Helping others improve.

embed.description: This is part of a series, where I try and help others go from Bronze to silver. Heck maybe even gold. Im not the one playing, Im spectating a game. If your bronze and want some help? Let me know.

body:
Well, after reaching gold.
I inspired someone to also try and climb the ladder.
And thought I will try and help out, he has agreed to me spectating random games.
In purpose in helping him get better.

But if anyone else is in bronze, Im more then happy to spectate some of your games and to try and help you guys as well.

replies.body: Thanks man, I really appreciate it. I was the mid Morgana that game, and my standard of play was really not up to scratch with my main roles, which are Jungle and ADC.

I'll have a gander after work tonight. Seems interesting. 
You're the support main yes?

Support main, then top, then jungle.
Mid I like too think im pretty decent at, and ADC is my worst role. But I can still farm someone at a silver level.
